tasks.task: Preparing and planting seeds in containers.
subtasks: Walking through the garden and assessing soil conditions.
Retrieving fresh soil from raised garden beds and preparing containers.
Applying all-purpose fertilizer to the soil.
Marking seed spacing using the square foot gardening method.
Planting lettuce, kale, and spinach seeds with proper spacing.
Planting radishes and onions, considering alternative spacing methods for container gardening.
Trellising peas using chicken wire and grow bags.
Covering seeds with mulch to retain moisture and protect from sun.

tasks.task: Converting raised garden beds to containers.
subtasks: Redistribution of soil from raised beds into new containers.
Preparing and moving containers to the garden.
Addressing dog interference by using smaller container sizes.
